text: Juan Gabriel Cotino Ferrer (26 January 1950 - 13 April 2020), known as Juan Cotino, was a Spanish businessman and politician. He was a member of the People's Party. He was born in Xirivella, Valencia. Cotino was a member of the Congress of Deputies from 2007 to 2014. From 2011 to 2014, he was President of Corts Valencianes. From 1996 to 2002, Cotino was general director of the police. Cotino died of COVID-19 on 13 April 2020 in Spain, aged 70.Muere por coronavirus Juan Cotino, exdirector de la Polic√≠a Nacional y antiguo dirigente del PP ==References== Category:1950 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Deaths from the COVID-19 pandemic in Spain Category:Spanish politicians Category:Spanish businesspeople
title: Juan Cotino
